body_html:
"the eos token should not be in those classes"? no. the padding token should not be in those classes. the eos token should be in them. valid label: [0, 15, 15, 12, 5, 27, -1, -1, -1] # 27 is EOS token, -1 is padding 29 classes for ctc logits outputs: 0, ..., 27 (eos), 28 (blank)
…
On Wed, Jan 17, 2018 at 3:34 PM, Jerome ***@***.***> wrote: Let's say I have a target label "apple". If I were to encode it, should it be like this: [0, 15, 15, 12, 5, 27, 26, 26, 26] # 27 is the eos_token, 26 is the padding Is it correct to say that there are 27 classes for ctc (the letters + the blank label) and the eos token should not be in those classes? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body_text:
"the eos token should not be in those classes"?  no.  the padding token
should not be in those classes.  the eos token should be in them.

valid label:

[0, 15, 15, 12, 5, 27, -1, -1, -1]  # 27 is EOS token, -1 is padding

29 classes for ctc logits outputs: 0, ..., 27 (eos), 28 (blank)
…
On Wed, Jan 17, 2018 at 3:34 PM, Jerome ***@***.***> wrote:
 Let's say I have a target label "apple". If I were to encode it, should it
 be like this:

 [0, 15, 15, 12, 5, 27, 26, 26, 26] # 27 is the eos_token, 26 is the
 padding

 Is it correct to say that there are 27 classes for ctc (the letters + the
 blank label) and the eos token should not be in those classes?

 —

body:
"the eos token should not be in those classes"?  no.  the padding token
should not be in those classes.  the eos token should be in them.

valid label:

[0, 15, 15, 12, 5, 27, -1, -1, -1]  # 27 is EOS token, -1 is padding

29 classes for ctc logits outputs: 0, ..., 27 (eos), 28 (blank)

On Wed, Jan 17, 2018 at 3:34 PM, Jerome <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Let's say I have a target label "apple". If I were to encode it, should it
> be like this:
>
> [0, 15, 15, 12, 5, 27, 26, 26, 26] # 27 is the eos_token, 26 is the
> padding
>
> Is it correct to say that there are 27 classes for ctc (the letters + the
> blank label) and the eos token should not be in those classes?
>
